attributes.action: Paediatric CPR & Basic First Aid to be given to expectant Parents during Ante Natal Care
attributes.additional_details:
Paediatric CPR & Basic First Aid needs to be given to expectant Parents during Ante Natal Care.
Babies & Toddlers die & are injured each day.
Often as expectant Parents we are taught how to make/sterilise Bottle, Bath our Baby.
Yet we are not taught the very important thing of being to provide correct first aid & in some case CPR of Babies.
CPR is so important & different to Adult CPR.
A few minutes between CPR being started by a Parent whilst waiting for a paramedic can make all the difference in keeping a Baby alive.
Implement Paediatric First Aid during Ante Natal Care. Save Lives
